[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Now you can customize the deep ore settings when using a [b]ground penetrating scanner[/b] to deep drill.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/g69KRUw.png[/img]
Through the settings menu you can set the following characteristics of each deep ore in your game (including mods.)
[list] [*][b]Commonality:[/b] how rare or common a resource should be compared to other resources. A weighted scale. [*][b]Resource amount:[/b] set how much of each ore your colonists dig up each digging cycle. [*][b]Vein size:[/b] alter how small or big the size of each ore vein can be [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/ldroDjl.png[/img]
Thank you to [b]Proxyer[/b] for the idea and motivation! This mod is dedicated to you.
